ngiemboon: Ammó gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé la nyɛ́ʼ nÿɔ́g mɔ́ɔn n gyá á yɔɔn: À la gwaa ńnyɛte ngǐm, mbà legǐ gẅie mé ka vɔg ńzáʼ, ńdɔg ńjÿɔ́g menɔ̀ɔn fùɔ zyě lekwɔ́ʼ.
en: The Lord God showed me this: He was forming a swarm of locusts   at the time the spring crop first began to sprout #— #after the cutting of the king’s hay.

ngiemboon: Páʼ ngǐm la pú ne ḿpfɛ́ɛ legǐ tsɛ̀ɛ láʼ pɔ́ ntsèm la, mèŋ n gɔɔn ngie: «Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé, zẅíʼte, e sẅíŋte gú, lege mefʉa pʉ̀a pú! Á lɔɔn te púʼu wɔ́, mbà pʉ̀a pú ŋwɛ́ ge láʼ cʉ́ʼʉ kɔ́? É kɔ́g tɛʼ!»
en: When the locusts finished eating the vegetation of the land,   I said, “Lord God, please forgive!  # 7:2 Jr 14:7,20–21; Ezk 9:8; 11:13 How will Jacob survive since he is so small? ”  # 7:2 Is 37:4; Jr 42:2

ngiemboon: À gwɔ́ púʼu Cʉ̀apʉ̀a kúbe nkwaŋá wé, ńgɔɔn ngie: «Ngwɔ́ tsɔ́ nò le láʼ ńgwɔ́ púʼu wɔ́.» Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ gɔɔn.
en: The Lord relented concerning this.   “It will not happen,” he said.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé la nyɛ́ʼ nÿɔ́g mɔ́ɔn, n gyá, á yɔɔn: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé la zába lélɔg mmɔ̌g, é sáʼ ntsaŋ; azẅɛ̌ mmɔ̌g la gÿo ntse gẅie ée tsɛ̀ɛ tsetsáʼ júm, ḿbiŋ tuɔ láʼa pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ.
en: The Lord God showed me this: The Lord God was calling for a judgment by fire.   It consumed the great deep and devoured the land.

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, n gɔɔn ngie: «Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Ssé, zẅíʼte, e sẅíŋte gú. Á té púʼu wɔ́ mbà pʉ̀a pú ge láʼ cʉ́ʼʉ kɔ́? Epʉ̀a pú nyé ńkɔ́g tɛʼ!»
en: Then I said, “Lord God, please stop!   How will Jacob survive since he is so small? ”

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a júʼ púʼu, ńkúbe nkwaŋá wé, ńgɔɔn ngie: «Ngwɔ́ tsɔ́ nò le láʼ ńgwɔ́ púʼu wɔ́,» Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɔ gɔɔn.
en: The Lord relented concerning this.   “This will not happen either,” said the Lord God.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie à la nyɛ́ʼ nÿɔ́g mɔ́ɔn, n gyá, á yɔɔn: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la tyé tyě á ngʉ̀ŋe sagá ndá, ńgẅiin paŋa tʉ̌.
en: He showed me this: The Lord was standing there by a vertical wall with a plumb line in his hand.

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a zɛ́te wɔ́ɔn ngie: «Ɔ̀ ne ńgyá kɔ́ Ámɔ́sè?» N tsɔ́ʼɔ mbwó yé ngie: «Á paŋa tʉ̌.» Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gíŋe ńgɔɔn ngie: N gyǎ ngie pʉ̀a pɔ́ɔn gwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ paŋa tʉ̌. Afʉ̀ʼɔɔn la, n te gíŋe lege mefʉa wɔb wɔ́.
en: The Lord asked me, “What do you see, Amos? ”

ngiemboon: N ge gÿo tágte mejʉʼ ssé
en: Isaac’s high places   will be deserted,

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, Amasiya gẅie à laa nùŋepwɔʼ, á tÿǒsoŋo Mbetɛɛ, tsẅi ngie mé gʉa shwóŋo Yelobowam gẅie à laa fùɔ pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ngie: Ámɔ́sè ne faʼa létsó gú na lʉŋe lefùɔ pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ḿmaʼa ssé. Aláʼ té ne ńzẅíŋe nò gie Amasiya gɔ̌ɔn wɔ́.
en: Amaziah the priest   of Bethel sent word to King Jeroboam of Israel, saying, “Amos has conspired against you  # 7:10 Jr 26:8–11; 38:4 right here in the house of Israel. The land cannot endure all his words,

ngiemboon: Á nue Ámɔ́sè ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: for Amos has said this: ‘Jeroboam will die by the sword, and Israel will certainly go into exile from its homeland.’ ”

ngiemboon: Amasiya gɔɔn mbwó Ámɔ́sè ngie: «Gù gẅie ɔɔ ngyàjʉʼ, fó jʉʼɔɔn sẅɛʼte nnɛ́, ńgʉa né láʼ pʉ̀a Yúndà. Ɔ̀ ge tóo wó, é jÿó pì páʼ ɔɔ ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé.
en: Then Amaziah said to Amos, “Go away, you seer!   Flee to the land of Judah. Earn your living  # 7:12 Lit Eat bread and give your prophecies there,

ngiemboon: Táʼ, te gíŋe shwóŋe páʼ ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé á Mbetɛɛ, á nue áa jʉʼ gie fùɔ tóo wó ńguʼte ssé, mbɔɔ pʉ̀a láʼ pé.»
en: but don’t ever prophesy   at Bethel again, for it is the king’s sanctuary  # 7:13 1Kg 12:29; Am 7:9 and a royal temple.”

ngiemboon: Ámɔ́sè tsɔʼɔ́ mbwó Amasiya ngie: «N te ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé wɔ́, ńké te ngàŋ zíʼi nò ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé wɔ́; n kɔ̌ɔn sẅɛ̀ɛ yɔ́ɔn pɔ́ mefòŋ, ḿbiŋe ńjʉ́ʼʉ tsɔ́ metÿǒ mie mé tóŋo lê sikomɔɔ.
en: So Amos answered Amaziah, “I was   not a prophet or the son of a prophet;  # 7:14 = a prophet’s disciple or a member of a prophetic guild,# 7:14 2Kg 2:3; 4:38; 2Ch 19:2 rather, I was  # 7:14 Or am a herdsman,  # 7:14 Am 1:1 and I took care of sycamore figs.

ngiemboon: N da gwaa gwɔ́ ńne ḿpféle menɔ̀ɔn, tá Cʉ̀apʉ̀a tóŋo wɔ́ɔn, ńgɔɔn né mèŋ ngie: Gʉa ńdɔg lezíŋ sɔ́ɔn ńgɔɔn nò mbwó pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ, é pʉ̀a pé.
en: But the Lord took me from following the flock   and said to me, ‘Go, prophesy to my people Israel.’ ”  # 7:15 Jr 1:7; Ezk 2:3–4

ngiemboon: Júʼu shwóŋo Cʉ̀apʉ̀a fʉ̀ʼɔɔn, gù gẅie ɔ̀ ne ńgɔɔn ngie te shwóŋè páʼ ntsẅìnkʉ̀ Ssé mbwó pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ, te shwóŋè té poŋ na ngẅɛ̀ ndá Ésàg.
en: Now hear the word of the Lord. You say:

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿǒ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gɔɔn ngie:
en: Therefore, this is what the Lord says:
